attributes.action: Look into the way Travel Companies hike up their prices in the School Holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it is disgraceful the way Holiday Firms hike up their holidays in the school holidays.

I have 2 children aged 3 (in Nursery) and 4 (in reception).

We want to go to Florida this year and the prices are shocking, to go in August its going to cost us over £4,000 but yet to go 2 weeks later will be just over £3,000.

The Goverment want parents not to take their children out of school for holidays but what choice do parents have?

A family holiday is just important to school time, especially when like us my husband works alot and hardly sees the children that a family holiday is a must for us.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HOLIDAYPRICING/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
